attributes.action: stop companies dissolving and reforming to avoid debt
attributes.additional_details: It's not fair that people go to court to be compensated or reimbursed for poor service or goods and the court finds in their favour but the company or individual concerned simply changes their name or company name and re forms in another disguise so the money can't be returned to the consumer.  It's a waste of court and individual time and money and makes the law ineffective
